overview.title: Trivia Night
overview.excerpt: Get ready to flex your brainpower at our trivia night! We're teaming up to bring you a night of fun challenges.

details.title: Trivia Night
details.longDescription: Teams compete across rounds of general knowledge, tech, and pop culture. Prizes for the top teams and snacks provided.
details.format: Teams of up to 4; multiple rounds with increasing difficulty
